Dec. 1, 1991 D Huddersfield & District BBA December Contest (Section A)
Huddersfield & District BBA December Contest (Section A) 10 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Huddersfield & District BBA December Contest huddersfield-district-bba-december-conte-4825
None
Huddersfield Town Hall, Huddersfield, West Yorkshire, England, UK Prizes - 1st £90, 2nd £70, 3rd £50. Best section 3 band (£40) Horbury Victoria. 8 bands competed.
